pages.text: $(o)More than just the Ender Dragon and Wither lord over this dimension, nor are endermen the strangest. AdventureZ is a catalogue of interesting creatures and dangerous bosses that wander the lands.
$(o)If you are interested in learning where to find these creatures, or how to summon these bosses, look in the Research Notes book. There's a section where you can procure guides and manuals.
